content.en: Efficient circuit design: Researchers are using algorithms to address various research questions in the field of digital signal processing and image processing. These algorithms are being employed to design low-power and energy-efficient circuits, such as adders, multipliers, and compressors. The goal is to optimize power consumption, reduce hardware complexity, improve speed and accuracy, and provide better compromises between power, delay, and accuracy in these applications.
content.da: Effektiv kredsløbsdesign: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for digital signalbehandling og billedbehandling. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at designe lavenergi- og energieffektive kredsløb, såsom addere, multiplikatorer og kompressorer. Målet er at optimere strømforbrug, reducere hardwarekompleksitet, forbedre hastighed og nøjagtighed samt at skabe bedre kompromiser mellem strøm, forsinkelse og nøjagtighed i disse anvendelser.
